content.content_text: XAMPP is a free and open-source cross-platform web server solution stack package developed by Apache Friends, consisting mainly of the Apache HTTP Server, MariaDB database, and interpreters for scripts written in the PHP and Perl programming languages.

content_alert.message: Before doing any changes to the files please save the original files in case something goes wrong.

content.content_text: To configure a XAMPP server to send emails we have to make changes to the files sendmail.ini and php.ini. These are found inside the folders php and sendmail.
Open the file sendmail.ini in a text editor and there you will find a few things to change.
Open the file php.ini in a text editor and there you will find a few things to change.

content_alert.message: Be sure to activate access to less secure webapp on your gmail account.

content.content_text: After completing all the steps above it's time to try sending an email using PHP. Just create a simple website with a form and on submit sends the email.
